title: What are different types of outdoor workout for fitness? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many types of outdoor workout for fitness Swimming  Sneak in some freestyle fitness by swimming laps. Calories blasted per hour: 476 Bonus benefit: Speak about a total-body workout! Swimming strengthens your chest, back, arms, abs, legs, and shoulders. Cycling  Pedal off the pounds over a ride a bike. Calories blasted hourly: Bonus benefit: Increase each hill to aid tighten and tone your legs, hips, and butt. Running  Is one of the least complex approaches to get fit - there's no extraordinary hardware or enrollment expenses and, regardless of the possibility that you are extremely occupied, you can fit it into your timetable. It conditions your thighs, hips, calves and bottom. calories blasted in 20 minutes: 175 a speedier pace consumes 260 calories. Hiking  Hit the trails or go for a hike in the woods. Calories blasted per hour: 442 Bonus benefit: You'll build strong, lovely legs when you absorb nature's beauty. If you want to more tips about outdoor workout for fitness

There are multiple cardio workouts that millions of people do because their ways to them are the very best. I’ve tried various methods such as bicycle riding, swimming, running, Trikke riding, Street Strider riding, walking. For my needs, the very best is a Me-Mover stepping machine. My needs require stability because I am 81 years old, I also require no hard foot impact on my joints. I also need a fast cardio workout, something that doesn/t require hours to do. My mobility is important to me, so I use the Me-Mover to ride in my county as well as many others for transportation purposes. Bottom line I get a cardio workout almost every day I’m on the scooter, even a short ride to the store. The very best in anything is a personal opinion that you should make up your own mind through evaluation. Good luck.
